import java.util.Scanner;

public class ques22 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i, j,r;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("enter rows");
		r=sc.nextInt();
		
		for (i=0; i<r; i++)   
		{  
	    
		for (j=r-i; j>1; j--)   
		{  
		
		System.out.print(" ");   
		}   
		
		for (j=0; j<=i; j++ )   
		System.out.print("* ");   

		System.out.println();   
		}   
		

	}

}
